responses: Hi there, what can I do for you?

patterns: What should be my cgpa for placements?
How high should my cgpa be for dream packages?
How much cgpa should I have for scholarship?
How high should my cgpa be for super dream packages?
responses: A Minimum of 8 is to maintained
Having above 9 will give edge over other students

patterns: Which college is the best in India?
Which college has best placements in India?
Which is the highest ranked college in India?
responses: IIT, NIT, BITS and VIT are the preferred top colleges in India but at the end your profile and hardwork is what matters
The Best college is India is IIT, NIT, BITS and VIT

patterns: What are the required skills for a software engineer?
Is Frontend enough to be a software engineer?
responses: The required skills expected of software engineer are FrontEnd, BackEnd and Data Structures and Algorithms and Problem Solving
A good software engineer is expected to be well versed with frontend, backend frameworks and be able to test and deploy softwares.

patterns: What soft skills are required to get placed?
Should I have leadership experience to get placed?
responses: Soft skills are essential for placements. One should have good communication, time management, problem solving, organizational skills, leadership experience etc
Good communication, time management, problem solving, organizational skills, leadership experience etc are essential for placements.

patterns: Should I go for placements or highers?
Should I consider higher education instead of placements?
responses: If research, academia is your forte and have no financial burden, you can consider higher education. If you want more of hands-on experience, you can go for placements.
